summary: A temporary fix for the current WETTriggerscript error--->READ DESCRIPTION FIRST
descriptionHtml:
The current version of NMM has resulted in alot of people recieving a WETTriggerScript error when loading a game in skyrim. The error is because there are two skyrim.esm entries in the plugins.txt in your AppData\\local\\skyrim folder. Until NMM fixes the issue, I created this script to remove all duplicate entries in the plugins.txt file.

I have fully redone the script so that there is no configuration needed on your part, so just download, run and enjoy. This file is now an all in one fix for both the duplicates problem and the missing skyrim.esm problem in the plugins folder.
Let me clear this up real quick: This is a script that you run separate from Skyrim...not a plugin.

Endorse if it helps
author: Allamorte

files.name: The one fix to solve it all
files.fileName: The one fix to solve it all-16440-2-1.rar
